description: Send code deploy and annotation events to stackdriver

level.description: one of INFO/WARN/ERROR, defaults to INFO if not supplied.  May affect display.

annotated_by.description: The person or robot who the annotation should be attributed to.

deployed_by.description: The person or robot responsible for deploying the code

deployed_to.description: The environment code was deployed to. (ie: development, staging, production)

instance_id.description: id of an EC2 instance that this event should be attached to, which will limit the contexts where this event is shown

msg.description: The contents of the annotation message, in plain text.  Limited to 256 characters. Required for annotation.

event_epoch.description: Unix timestamp of where the event should appear in the timeline, defaults to now. Be careful with this.

revision_id.description: The revision of the code that was deployed. Required for deploy events

event.description: The type of event to send, either annotation or deploy
